metadata.title: CVE-2018-20591 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered in decompileJUMP function inutil/decompile.c of libming v0.4.8. A crafted input can cause segmentationfaults, leading to denial-of-service, as demonstrated by swftocxx.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
